reviewText: Exactly what I was looking for.
Arrived in good shape and in timely manner.  Enjoying the DVD.  Thanks!

I liked the Meditation Prep section with Yee and the Mindful Meditation section with Maritza. I had a problem with the Refresh section with Yee. In that section I found both the narration and the music too distracting so had to eventually just turn it off/eject. As a result, I recommend only 2 of the 3 sections on the DVD. Would have given 3 1/2 stars if possible.
I have been wanting to try meditation, but I didn't quite understand how to do it. This DVD helped me so much. It was exactly as described.
I was hoping my husband would use this too, but no luck.  He does use the yoga DVD from Rodney Yee I got at the same time.

This is very good combination of stretching, relaxation and initiation to meditation. Each part can be done separatelly with about 20 min each, or done together. The speed of Maritza's narration and her calm guidenance is really nice.
This is a very nice dvd because you get several ways to meditate!  Not just one choice.  Received this on time & brand new.
Great way to start the day!
This is simple enough for my beginning yet it I can see I'll use it to build on.
Really helps me relax and stress relief. my GF and I do this once a week.

I listened for the first time 'Mindful Meditation' narrated by Marzita. After just a few minutes I had to stop it because of the background music, in particular a warbling flute, it often drowns out the narration and I found it distracting and annoying. I wish  there was a way to cut the background music. Since I bought this a month ago I can no longer return it. My suggestion would be to turn the volume down where you can just barely hear the narrator. The flute music decreases as you get further into the meditation so if you can get past the beginning, you might find this useful.
It's o.k. Find a better one with better instruction. Don't spend very much for this one. It's not really worth it.
If you are serious about learning this art -yes, it is-by a pro who's been meditating a long time, Mr. Yee is a perfect start.
